name: Sunrise Transciption
tag_list: medical-transcription, emr-transcription, dictation-service, transcription-service, hipaa-transcription, quality-transcription-service
overview:
Medical Transcription Service in the Cloud

-No set-up Fee - No Monthly Minimum -No Lost Dictations - Multiple Delivery Options -Easy EMR Integration

-iPhone, Android, & BlackBerry Dictation Apps

Sunrise Transcription lets you dictate from any phone, digital recorder, iPhone, Blackberry & Android App!

Easily edit and save reports online, ensuring your records are always up to date

Dictations are available for review online within minutes of dictating them

Locate records quickly and easily via our interactive search engine

Reports print automatically to any designated printer at your facility .
